title: tanalOnE dhyAninci
sahitya:
tanalOnE dhyAninci tanmayamE gAvalerA

anupallavi

 tanaguhalO dAnuNDEDu tAvunu deliyaga valerA

caraNam 1

 nI marma mAkSaNamE nishcayapai telusunurA
   
caraNam 2

 Enanu mAyAvELa nEvankO teliyadurA
   
caraNam 3

 toli karmamE balamu tOyakUDadu vidhiki
   
caraNam 4

 prAkrti svabhAvamulu prajvaLincucu nuNDu
   
caraNam 5

lakSyamu jEyaru madilO lakSAntara munakaina
   
caraNam 6

 mringina kallaku rucula mElu ganE vArevaru
   
caraNam 7

 bhUtamu laidanu nIvu porala jEyu cunnAvu
   
caraNam 8

 niravadhi shayyapai nIvu nityAnandamu nunnAvu
   
caraNam 9

 shrI tyAgarAjuni cEbaTTi rakSincedavu
